title: Here are the 10 most central claims that have shaped the debate about Greenland
content: This article was written and published by TjekDet. Donald Trump revived his desire to own Greenland for reasons of national security when he was reinstated as President of the United States a year ago. And over the past month, the rhetoric has intensified. Donald Trump himself, other American politicians, and American influencers have put forward […]
creator: Team NORDIS

title: Is that true? The United States has spilled more blood in the protection of Greenland than Denmark, says American politician
content: This article was written and published by TjekDet. Greenland should belong to the United States. And from the perspective of American politicians, there are several natural reasons for this, when you look at the history between Greenland and the United States. Recently, US congressman Andy Ogles said the following in an interview with FOX News: […]
creator: Team NORDIS
